attributes.action: introduce legislation that requires sales receipts for all motor fuels to clearly show the amount paid in taxes and duties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price paid for motor fuel includes an unusually high level of taxes and duties in comparison to other commodities.
Motorists are unable to take an informed position in any debate on what constitutes an acceptable level of Government revenue from fuel sales, because the figures are not clear. Sales receipts in USA and Canada have included this breakdown of what is paid in taxes and what goes to the fuel companies, for many years. This information should be made available to motorists in UK now.
